right.text: Lol, outbursts? You know what? FUCK YOU!!!!

left.text: I don't particularly care. I've become somewhat immune to Serge's outbursts... but I take care of my channel. >:|
If I EVER see you in real life, I'm going to SHANK YOU WITH A SERRATED KNIFE and rip your FUCKING instestines out, you HOMOPHOBIC FAGGOT WITH TITS
...This is EXACTLY what I fucking mean about nobody in the MZX community liking me and now you FUCKING KNOW WHY
